meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Someone</kanji> who has <kanji>escape</kanji>d <kanji>death</kanji> by running away is a <vocabulary>fugitive</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>runaway</vocabulary>. I think there was a movie about that once!
